comments.body: Could you please also add a comment here that this threshold value is compressed size in registry?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@	mb           int64 = 1024 * 1024
	minThreshold int64 = 23 * mb
	maxThreshold int64 = 1000 * mb
)

comments.body: I know that this predates your changes but it'd be better to include initContainers.
@silveryfu and @resouer, could you guys work on a follow-up PR to address this?
Thanks! Ref this comment: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/65745#discussion_r201619222 There will be following PR for `initContainers` specifically.
Ohh sorry, did not notice it. Thanks @resouer

We should add a TODO comment here to describe the conner cases we did not cover right now.

In my mind, the exceptions are:

1. Use Docker as runtime and `docker.io/library/test:tag` in pod spec, only `test:tag` will present in node status.
2. First present implicit registry in pod spec. i.e. `test:tag` in pod spec but only `docker.io/library/test:tag` in node status. Please note this should not happen when user consistently use one type of registry format.
